      • getClients

        public static List<Socket> getClients​(int channel)
        Get a list of clients in a channel.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel we want to get clients of.
        Returns:
        A List of Sockets which represents clients of the channel.

        Parameters:
        port - The port on which open the socket.

      • sendMessage

        public static void sendMessage​(String message,
                               int channel,
                               Object... optionalArgs)
        Send a message to every clients of a channel or only a client. Allows to save the message in the channel's historic.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to send.
        channel - The channel to send the message to.
        optionalArgs - Options : instance of Socket - The client to send the message to. Instance of Boolean - The message to send.

      • getChannelHistoricFile

        private static String getChannelHistoricFile​(int channel)
        Get the channel's historic's file's path.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel we want to get the historic of.
        Returns:
        String the file's path or null if the file couldn't be created.

      • saveMessage

        private static void saveMessage​(String message,
                                int channel)
        Save a message in the channel's historic.
        Parameters:
        message - The message we want to save.
        channel - The channel in which the message needs to be saved.

        public static void retrieveHistoric​(Socket client,

        Retrieve the historic of a channel to a client.
        Parameters:

        channel - The channel to retrieve the historic of.
